verbose_text: Previous contributions showed that GAPDH expression is regulated by a variety of factors like calcium [XREF_BIBR], insulin [XREF_BIBR], and hypoxia [XREF_BIBR], although the transcription factor hypoxia inducible factor-1 (HIF-1) regulates the expression of genes which are involved in glucose supply, growth, metabolism, redox reactions and blood supply.
